obstetrics_and_gynecology_services.title: Obstetrics and Gynecology Services
obstetrics_and_gynecology_services.description: Obstetrics & Gynecology provides comprehensive care for women, including prenatal care, fertility treatments, reproductive health, and management of various gynecological conditions for overall well-being.
services: Diagnosis and treatment of menstrual disorders
Minimally invasive gynecological surgeries (e.g., cyst removal, fibroid surgeries)

ivf_unit_services.title: IVF Unit Services
ivf_unit_services.description: IVF (Test Tube Baby) and IUI are advanced fertility treatments designed to assist couples in achieving pregnancy.
services: Supportive care and counseling throughout the IVF process

plastic_and_reconstructive_surgery.title: Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery
plastic_and_reconstructive_surgery.description: Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery offers advanced treatments for aesthetic enhancement and restorative procedures, including body contouring, facial surgeries, and repair of traumatic injuries or congenital defects.

subservices: Skin rejuvenation with Profhilo and Profound injections
Platelet-rich plasma (PRP) and skin revitalization injections of all types
Hydrafacial sessions for deep skin cleansing
Skin and double chin tightening with HIFU (Ulthera)
Skin rejuvenation with INFINI (advanced microneedling and radiofrequency device)

general_dentistry_services.title: General Dentistry Services
general_dentistry_services.description: General Dental Services provide comprehensive oral care, including routine check-ups, teeth cleaning, cosmetic dentistry, fillings, root canals, crowns, bridges, and dental implants for overall oral health.
services: Treatment of dental cavities and fillings
Treatment of gum inflammation and oral diseases
Consultations for oral and dental care

ear_nose_and_throat_services.title: Ear, Nose, and Throat Services
ear_nose_and_throat_services.description: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Services offer diagnosis and treatment for conditions related to the ear, nose, throat, including hearing loss, sinus issues, and balance disorders.
services: Diagnosis and treatment of ear, nose, and throat diseases
Treatment of middle and inner ear infections
Management of hearing problems with hearing tests and assistive devices
Hearing assessments for children and adults
Treatment of nasal obstruction and sinus adhesions
Treatment of snoring and sleep apnea
Treatment of laryngeal diseases, including hoarseness and throat infections
Treatment of benign and malignant tumors in the ear, nose, and throat
Treatment of headaches caused by nasal or ear issues
Diagnosis and treatment of balance disorders and vertigo
Treatment of breathing problems caused by nasal or throat conditions
Removal of foreign objects from the ear, nose, and throat

general_medicine_services.title: General Medicine Services
general_medicine_services.description: General Medical Practitioner provides primary healthcare services, offering diagnosis, treatment, and preventive care for a wide range of medical conditions to promote overall well-being.
services: Comprehensive diagnosis and treatment of diseases
Prescription of medications and injections (e.g., Mounjaro and Ozempic)
Treatment of common issues such as fever, sore throat, chest infections, vitamin deficiencies, anemia, headaches, fatigue, stomach or colon pain, constipation, and urinary tract infections
Management of chronic conditions such as hypertension, diabetes, and thyroid problems, with advice and treatment for obesity

pharmacy_services.title: Pharmacy Services
pharmacy_services.description: Our pharmacy offers prescription medications, consultations, over-the-counter remedies, alternative treatments, and specialized care for emergencies, dermatological needs, and long-term health management.
services: Providing consultations on the correct use of medications
Dispensing medications for both short-term and long-term treatments
Offering advice on alternative treatments like vitamins and dietary supplements
Monitoring side effects and warnings related to medications
Offering advice on suitable medications for minor emergencies
Supplying medications for dermatological and cosmetic treatments

products.title: Products
products.description: We provide a range of healthcare and beauty essentials, including prescription and over-the-counter medications, skincare items like moisturizers and face masks, and cosmetic products such as foundation and nail polish.
services: Medicines: A wide range of prescription and over-the-counter medications for various health conditions
Skincare: Moisturizing creams and specialized face masks.
Cosmetic Products: Foundation and Nail Polish.

surgical_garments.title: Surgical Garments
surgical_garments.description:
We offer high-quality surgical garments designed for comfort and effective recovery, including abdominal binders, full-body support garments, and postpartum wear to aid healing and body reshaping.
Our garments are made for comfort and effectiveness, ensuring ease of use during recovery.
services: Abdominal Binders: Designed for comfort and effective recovery after abdominal surgeries.
Full-Body Support Garments: Designed for comfort and body reshaping after surgeries.
Postpartum Wear: Designed for comfort and recovery after childbirth.
